summary: A rough alpha Roman Camp idea for input
descriptionHtml:
Update: Due to work commitments i hereby give full permissions for anyone to take this start point and do their own version! I look forward to seeing your creations! Enjoy!!

Very rough Alpha sketch for input - Any navmesh experts out there who could help me? Had a few hours (I am using the Historic Revival Mod http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32988/?) so I put together a rough Roman Camp and thought i would share to see if this is worth improving and to get some ideas as to where it should be built.

Its not trying to be a permanent fort rather the type of fortified camp the Romans constructed every night on the march. The obvious idea would be to upgrade all the CW Imperial camps........I await your comments.

Located: Near Rorikstead (Near the Military Camp)

Credits: using Doktorvlad's cool banner mod: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32833/? 

Conflicts: Grayhill Fort & Seasons of Skyrim

Believe it is fine to download (Always save and back up as usual) has the usual cooking, sleeping and smithing amenities

Please note the storage barrels and chest are not safe in the Alpha version and may re-spawn........

Versions:
v0.1: Basic camp

v0.2: Added 6 towers and stakes 

v0.3: Added Gates and portcullis added, Legate tent changed, soldier tents made larger, forge re-positioned
author: Draig77

files.name: Roman Camp with Towers and Gates Version Alpha
